#CityHallSelfieDay is 8/15! ü§≥
Join us in celebrating the #localgov service. Participation is easy:
ü§≥ Take a picture of yourself (or with friends & family) in front of a City facility
üì± Post the picture with the hashtags #CityofOntario and #CityHallSelfie
üòÅ Tag us in your post https://t.co/u34ZT7svfW

Join us in taking part in City Hall Selfie Day Monday, August 15!ü§≥

1Ô∏è‚É£ Snap a picture in front of City Hall or any City building, park, or facility.

2Ô∏è‚É£ Post it on social media, include #CityHallSelfie, and tag us!

We look forward to seeing your selfies!

Less than one week until @ELGL50 #CityHallSelfie day and I'm trying to figure out what I'm going to do this year...

City Hall Selfie Day is Monday, August 15!  Join in celebrating government pride by taking a picture of yourself or with a group in front of #SalisburyNC City Hall! We will have a balloon wall set up from 11 a.m. to 1 p.m.  #CityHallSelfie #SalisburySelfie https://t.co/0fdSD3LgQV

tweets.text:
